SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.vulkan

Class VkBindVideoSessionMemoryInfoKHR

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkBindVideoSessionMemoryInfoKHR
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class VkBindVideoSessionMemoryInfoKHR extends Struct implements NativeResource
Structure specifying memory bindings for a video session object.
Valid Usage (Implicit)
  • sType must be STRUCTURE_TYPE_BIND_VIDEO_SESSION_MEMORY_INFO_KHR
  • pNext must be NULL
  • memory must be a valid VkDeviceMemory handle
See Also

BindVideoSessionMemoryKHR

Layout


 struct VkBindVideoSessionMemoryInfoKHR {
     VkStructureType sType();
     void const * pNext();
     uint32_t memoryBindIndex();
     VkDeviceMemory memory();
     VkDeviceSize memoryOffset();
     VkDeviceSize memorySize();
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • VkBindVideoSessionMemoryInfoKHR

      public VkBindVideoSessionMemoryInfoKHR(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a VkBindVideoSessionMemoryInfoKHR instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
